message: Hello. Please help me
Sure. How can I help you?
My order is delayed. When can I expect it?
I am sorry to hear that. Please help me with the order number
Okay. My order number is 1234567890
Thank you! Please give me some time to retrieve the status of your order
okay!
Thanks for waiting! I can see that your order is delayed by several days. We are very sorry for your inconvenience
When can I expect my order?
In another five business days.
You guys are taking so much time! What is wrong with my order? Why so much delay??
We regret the inconvenience caused to you. There seems to be some delay from the vendor's end
This is so annoying. That is not my problem right. You are responsible for the delay. Why is it taking so much time? And I am not getting any email updates regarding my order.
Sir, we are very sorry for your inconvenience. Your order is currently at our Delhi hub and will be dispatched shortly.
Okay. If it is at Delhi why is it taking so much time. It should not take so much time from Delhi to reach to my delivery location
We are very sorry sir. Our agents are working on the delivery on priority.
This is whhat you call working on priority! It is very delayed. I am very dissatisfied with your service
We are very sorry sir. We will make sure that your order is delivered to you on priority
I don't want any further delay
Please be assured there won't be any further delay from our side.
If it is delayed anymore, I would cancel the order
No sir. Please be assured that would not happen!
okay then
Sure sir. Thanyou for talking to us. Feel free to reach out.
Thanks!
